headline: UPS Faces Post-SurePost Challenges: Analyst Sees Long-Term Gain But Near-Term Hurdles
summary: United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS) shares are trading lower on Thursday. JP Morgan analyst Brian P. Ossenbeck reiterated the Neutral rating on United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS). The analyst notes that the contract between UPS and the United States Postal Service (USPS) for SurePost expired on December 31, 2024, and it seems the two companies did not reach a new agreement. This is separate from the air cargo contract UPS secured with FedEx Corporation (NYSE:FDX) in 2024. Ossenbeck views

headline: These 2 Transportation Stocks Could Beat Earnings: Why They Should Be on Your Radar
summary: The Zacks Earnings ESP is a great way to find potential earnings surprises. Why investors should take advantage now.
